function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for the spread of COVID-19 through the deployment and use of the CVID-19 digital signage system in public spaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases such as COVID-19 among the population.","Mitigation":"Implement strict mask-wearing policies, regular disinfection of the devices, and enforcement of social distancing measures in the vicinity of the digital signage system.","Technologies":"Use of thermal imaging cameras, facial recognition algorithms, and QR code check-in systems to detect symptoms and enforce safety protocols.","People":"General public, users of the digital signage system, and individuals in the vicinity of the system.","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility operators, and system administrators."}]}
